title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content:
cations as you explore. You will also catch him at the Last Night inn.

Upon meeting Raphael at the Last Light Inn Astarion will ask him to tell him the meaning of runes on his back. These runes are scars his former master gave him. Raphael is intrigued, but says he wants something done by him first and will get in touch once he is ready to say what that is.

Find Raphael in the shadow-cursed lands.

We met Raphael at the Last Light Inn and Astarion asked about the scars Cazador left on his back
